spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent room adjacency and wall alignment. Door swings generally match. Minor scaling issues in the Alfresco area which appears slightly smaller in the 3D render than the 2D proportions suggest.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms from the floor plan are represented including the Laundry and WIP. No text or UI elements present. Roof is correctly removed. Deducted points for some wall thickness variations not present in the plan.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture placement (beds, kitchen island, dining tables) is highly accurate. The car in the garage and the study desks are correctly oriented.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Perfect adherence to style constraints: low-poly, flat shading, isometric orthographic camera, and a dark neutral background.

detected_errors.description: Minor layout distortion in the Alfresco/Living transition where the outer boundary wall depth doesn't perfectly match the 2D recessed lines.
